Product Description

NEWNEN COB 18 LEDs Outdoor Solar Spot Lights

Not only does a NEWNEN LED spotlight functions as a source to light at night, it can also create a touch of luxury to your property, highlight a few important structures that you want to emphasize, as well as bring a feel of mystery and romance to the surrounding areas. More importantly, they will save you a lot of money on the electricity bill by charging up fully during the day and lighting after dusk.

Warm tips:

Please confirm the switch is under “on” status so that the light could be charged normally and auto lights on at night.(Cover the solar panel in the daytime or go to the dark environment for testing.)Please make sure that the light’s photocell is not affected by other light sources at night.The brightness and duration of solar lights will be different because it is affected by the climate, seasons, geographical location and other factors.The solar spotlights may need more time (at least 6-8 hours) to be fully charged in the rainy, snowy cloudy weather.

Turn on or off automatically at the right time

Modern light sensor to operate automatically

Dusk-to-Dawn Solar Powered Outdoor Light

It cones with two brightness levels, high light mode that last for 6 hours and low light mode that lasts for 10 hours

High Light Mode:Long press for 3-5 seconds, the spotlight will automatically light up High light mode at night.Low Light Mode:Press again, the spotlight will automatically light up Low light mode at night.

Note: Please make sure to turn on the switch before charge the solar light during the day.

Includes an adjustable, powerful solar panel and spot light,Effective and quick in transform sunlightEmits a bright light, covering a large area and more focused

Wide Applications:

Pathway Lighting

solar light for flag pole

Wall mount garage lighting

Garden Lighting

Solar landscape spotlights are increasingly becoming a popular choice over the past few years because of raising awareness of renewable energy. These small yet advanced units would be a great addition to your beautiful garden or backyard thanks to modern and futuristic designs.

The solar spot lights outdoor give just the right glow to brighten all the plants and make it beautiful at night. The 2 settings of High and Low light are perfect for creating the right mood for your front yard

It can be used not only as a lawn light, but also as a wall light .if you like outdoor sports. use it as a camping light or a flashlight.

Pros：

Easy to install without the wiring tasksCompletely powered and run by the sunConstructed from durable and weather-proof ABS plasticModern and simple designLong-lasting operation and quick rechargIP67 waterproof performance makes it ideal to use under all weather conditions

NOTE:

In order to maximize the lighting effect, please make sure that the solar landscape spotlight is full of sunlight electricity.Please install the solar lights in the place where the sun can directly shine, and make sure there is no shelter above the solar panel, such as eaves and trees.The default mode of the product is Off mode. Press power button to turn on modes when using the product.It is recommended to turn off the light and charge it under direct sunlight for 1-2 days before the first use. make sure the product has enough power.During the installation, please make sure the landscape light is installed under direct sunlight where there is no shade or eave to shelter the solar panel. Otherwise, the lighting time will be shorter.if the lighting time shortens after the product has worked for a period, check whether the solar panel is covered with dusts and clean it regularly.Please make sure to turn on the switch before use.

LED Beads 18 LEDs Brightness 150-250 lumen Beam Angle 90 degrees Waterproof Rating IP67 Color Temperature 6000-6500K Solar Batteries #18650 Working Temperature -10°~45°

More Uniform and More Focused: adopting the unique design of the reflector of the water trough complemented by advanced 19 cob-led lamp beads, the solar spotlights outdoor waterproof can emit a more concentrated and uniform beam of light without glare
2 Brightness Levels: Low light mode (10Hrs) / High light mode (7Hrs). With ultra brightness and focus, the solar outdoor lights provides full illumination to your patio or driveway. With a focused beam of light, you can point the solar flag pole light to light any place and draw lots of attention to your garden, flag, or backyard
Suitable for Extreme Complex Weather: The solar lights adopt IP68 waterproof technology and anti-ultraviolet ABS material for durability. The outdoor solar lights for yard can withstand all kinds of bad weather even in heavy rain, high temperature, and heavy snow
Versatile and Easy to Install: the solar spot lights outdoor can be used as solar landscape lights with the light stake inserted into the ground to highlight trees, sculptures, flags, etc; or screwed to a wall or pillar for illumination, to light up a porch, pathway, driveway garden, etc


NEWNEN COB 18 LEDs Outdoor Solar Spot Lights

Not only does a NEWNEN LED spotlight functions as a source to light at night, it can also create a touch of luxury to your property, highlight a few important structures that you want to emphasize, as well as bring a feel of mystery and romance to the surrounding areas. More importantly, they will save you a lot of money on the electricity bill by charging up fully during the day and lighting after dusk.

Warm tips:

  • Please confirm the switch is under “on” status so that the light could be charged normally and auto lights on at night.(Cover the solar panel in the daytime or go to the dark environment for testing.)
  • Please make sure that the light’s photocell is not affected by other light sources at night.
  • The brightness and duration of solar lights will be different because it is affected by the climate, seasons, geographical location and other factors.
  • The solar spotlights may need more time (at least 6-8 hours) to be fully charged in the rainy, snowy cloudy weather.

  • Turn on or off automatically at the right time

Modern light sensor to operate automatically

Dusk-to-Dawn Solar Powered Outdoor Light

  • It cones with two brightness levels, high light mode that last for 6 hours and low light mode that lasts for 10 hours

  1. High Light Mode:Long press for 3-5 seconds, the spotlight will automatically light up High light mode at night.
  2. Low Light Mode:Press again, the spotlight will automatically light up Low light mode at night.

Note: Please make sure to turn on the switch before charge the solar light during the day.

  • Includes an adjustable, powerful solar panel and spot light,Effective and quick in transform sunlight
  • Emits a bright light, covering a large area and more focused

Wide Applications:

Pathway Lighting

solar light for flag pole

Wall mount garage lighting

Garden Lighting

Read more

Solar landscape spotlights are increasingly becoming a popular choice over the past few years because of raising awareness of renewable energy. These small yet advanced units would be a great addition to your beautiful garden or backyard thanks to modern and futuristic designs.

The solar spot lights outdoor give just the right glow to brighten all the plants and make it beautiful at night. The 2 settings of High and Low light are perfect for creating the right mood for your front yard

It can be used not only as a lawn light, but also as a wall light .if you like outdoor sports. use it as a camping light or a flashlight.

Pros：

  • Easy to install without the wiring tasks
  • Completely powered and run by the sun
  • Constructed from durable and weather-proof ABS plastic
  • Modern and simple design
  • Long-lasting operation and quick recharg
  • IP67 waterproof performance makes it ideal to use under all weather conditions

NOTE:

  1. In order to maximize the lighting effect, please make sure that the solar landscape spotlight is full of sunlight electricity.
  2. Please install the solar lights in the place where the sun can directly shine, and make sure there is no shelter above the solar panel, such as eaves and trees.
  3. The default mode of the product is Off mode. Press power button to turn on modes when using the product.
  4. It is recommended to turn off the light and charge it under direct sunlight for 1-2 days before the first use. make sure the product has enough power.
  5. During the installation, please make sure the landscape light is installed under direct sunlight where there is no shade or eave to shelter the solar panel. Otherwise, the lighting time will be shorter.
  6. if the lighting time shortens after the product has worked for a period, check whether the solar panel is covered with dusts and clean it regularly.
  7. Please make sure to turn on the switch before use.

LED Beads 18 LEDs
Brightness 150-250 lumen
Beam Angle 90 degrees
Waterproof Rating IP67
Color Temperature 6000-6500K
Solar Batteries #18650
Working Temperature -10°~45°

Price: $29.99

Specification

Light Color: WarmMaterial: Hard PlasticBattery: AA 1.2V 800mAh Ni-MHSize: 25.6 * 3.15 inchWaterproof Rating: IP65Charging time: 6-8 hoursWorking time: 8-12 hours after fully charged

LETMY 6 PACK Modern Solar Pathway Lights

LETMY solar landscape lights provide warm bright light, add magical romantic lighting to your path, patio, garden, lawn, pathway, driveway, villa, landscape, balcony and any other outdoor places.

Save Money & Protect Environment

No wiring needed, no battery required. LETMY solar walkway light is 100% solar powered. Our solar lights outdoor decorative help save your electricity costs. Energy saving and protect environment.

Tips For Usage 1. Remove the insulating sheet before use 2. Please make sure the solar landscape lights absorb sufficient sunlight in the daytime. 3. Please dig a hole on the ground before inserting the spike if the soil is quite hard.

Upgraded Higher Efficient Solar Panel

Compared to other cheap solar panels, our solar panel of solar lights use lamination technology, more durable and corrosion-resistant. Higher conversion rate than ordinary solar panels. Solar powered lights can receive more sunlight, and the lighting time is longer.

Super Bright Upgraded Filament LED

Solar landscape lights adopt upgraded filament LED, more durable and brighter than other cheap solar pathway lights. These solar path lights emit a warm light and provide 360° illumination which creates a romantic atmosphere.

Larger Battery Capacity & Longer Working Time

The solar outdoor path light has a built-in 800mAh super large battery capacity, then others only have 300mAh, and the lighting time is longer than others. Our solar outdoor lights can work 8-12 hours at night, while others can only work 6-8 hours.

BRIGHTER & LONGER LASTING: These outdoor walkway lights solar powered adopt the newest lighting technology, which creates a romantic and warm atmosphere and are brighter than other oudoor solar lights. Solar landscape lights have a larger battery capacity 800 mAh rechargeable Ni-MH, while others only 300 mAh. Solar garden lights can light up to 8 -12 hours and provide clear illumination brightness, which is working longer than other led solar landscape lighting.
SOLAR POWERED & HIGHER EFFICIENT:The solar landscape light outdoor are 100% solar-powered. The solar path lights last throughout most of the night and will save on your energy bills since they’re powered by the sun. solar powered outdoor lights use upgraded monocrystalline solar panels, which makes our solar yard lights have higher conversion rates, charge faster, and be more efficient than other solar walkway lights.The conversion rate can be up to 25%.
ALL-WEATHER-RESISTANT & EASY TO INSTALLY: Outdoor solar pathway lights with a high waterproof level IP65. Don’t worry about rain, snow, frost, or sleet. Corrosion-resistant ABS plastic can ensure the long-lasting life and durability of these outdoor lights solar powered. No additional tools are required to install these solar path lights outdoor. Quickly install these solar driveway lights by pushing this solar landscape light outdoor into the ground.
WIDE APPLICATION & AFTER-SALE SERVICE: You can use solar lights outdoor everywhere like a garden, lawn, walkway, pathway, patio or yard, etc. We provide 60 days replacement or risk-free refund warranty for our garden lights solar powered. If you have any questions about our landscape path lights please contact us immediately and we will do our best to solve your problem.

8 Pack Solar Pathway Lights
6 Pack Solar Lily Flower Lights
4 Pack Solar Post Lights
